recipes.startdescription: There's always more to learn. [Improve this skill to level 2. This will increase its Aspects, which'll help with crafting; and make it suitable for higher branches in the Tree of Wisdoms, if you haven't already committed it.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 2. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: I'm no expert... but I'm no dabbler, either. [Improve this skill to level 3.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 3. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: Another fruit plucked from knowledge's tree. [Improve this skill to level 4.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 4. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: So satisfying, to have come so far. [Improve this skill to level 5.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 5. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: At last, I'm something of an authority in this. [Improve this skill to level 6.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 6. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: When I thought I'd understood, I'd only begun. [Improve this skill to level 7.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 7. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: At last, I approach mastery... [Improve this skill to level 8.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 8. Its Power aspects have also increased.]

recipes.startdescription: There's always more to learn. [Improve this skill to level 9.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 9. Its Power aspects have also increased.]
